dataset_id: CARVE: In-flight Videos from the CARVE Aircraft, Alaska, 2012-2015
title: CARVE: In-flight Videos from the CARVE Aircraft, Alaska, 2012-2015
summary: This dataset contains videos captured by a camera mounted on the CARVE aircraft during airborne campaigns over the Alaskan and Canadian Arctic for the Carbon in Arctic Reservoirs Vulnerability Experiment (CARVE). Flight campaigns took place from 2012 to 2015 between the months of March and November to enable investigation of both seasonal and inter-annual variability in atmospheric gas content.
